The other day, I was watching the Love is Blind UK edition on Netflix. Most of the dudes had facial hair, and three were rocking it properly. Another dude was super patchy but kept it short and rocked his stash. But this other dude, Bobby, had the most messed-up beard I've ever seen. His harsh line under his jaw got me thinking about you because I don't want your beard to be horrible. That said, I want to present the world's worst beard fails and how to fix them. Fix that f^cked up beard asap -- here's how:


Improper edging or shaving of the underside. Check out my demonstration in the video. Don't chop it closer to the jawbone or carve it out underneath. Your jaw will look weak, and you appear to have a double chin.


Neck beards. These are disgusting. You need to shave under your neck, or you will look like a wild man who doesn't understand that the look is dirty. Find your boundaries.


Bushy, round beards. A beard that is big, full, and bold sucks because it makes your face look fat. You need to make sure you're tapering down the sides. A poofy beard that's the same length on the chin as on the cheeks is a huge fail. Groom and train it, and make sure it's lying flat and not puffed out. When it pops out, your face looks fat and round. Make sure it's tapered shorter on the sides and longer on the chin area. This will help draw an eye down, making your chin look stronger.


Hard lines. A beard that suddenly stops bald at a hard line is horrible. You shouldn't go from beard to bald abruptly; you must ensure you fade and taper it. Have a transition from the hair on your head to the hair on your face. Don't chop off the beard at any specific point, even if it's a skin fade. You need a skin-to-beard fade, which takes a little time and practice. Check out my instructions in the video.


Thin, patchy stragglers. If you've grown out your beard to see what you're working with and then discover it's thin and see-through, it's not good.¬† Ensure you don't have a straggly, patchy, long mess on your face. Hair follicle density varies from person to person; use what you have to work with, whether it's a mustache, soul patch, or otherwise. You can also keep it short stubble, which looks better than straggly and thin facial hair. Embrace what you have; the good news is that your facial hair can start filling in more as you age.


Big and stinky. This is what a beard gets completely out of hand and looks gross. Even if you're super hygienic, big beards can make you look dirty, like you haven't taken care of yourself. A big, stinky beard equals a stinky big manbush. You need to take care of your beard. If you want to grow it out, keep it trimmed, edged, and maintained. You need to brush and hydrate it regularly. Also, trimming your mustache is imperative because nobody wants to make out with mustache hair.

videos.title: 25 "Little Boy" Items a Grown Man NEVER Wears!
videos.description:
THE BEST BELTS! click https://ansonbelt.com/alpham for a Special Deal (limited time) I recommend the box set giving you 6 possible belt combos for under $100. You'll love them https://ansonbelt.com/alpham
Also, sign up for their email list and "Anson TXT Club" for exclusive offers. Thanks, Anson Belts for sponsoring!

Fake leather. Whether it's shoes, belts, jackets, or otherwise, fake leather sucks. Real leather doesn't cost that much more, and it lasts longer.

Beat-up sneakers. Dirty shoes should be tossed.

Casual sneakers with everything. Upgrade and elevate your casual shoe game to separate yourself from the boys.

Bright colors and loud patterns. Boys will wear those, but men will not. Tone down coloring to look more mature, rugged, and sexy. Incorporate some color, but opt for softer and more muted shades. Bright reds, yellows, and blues are youthful and make you look bigger. Bright colors reflect light.

Stripes. Stripes also will make you look like a 12-year-old boy. Wear smaller and more subtle patterns to look more refined.

Oversized clothing. Big and baggy clothing can be stylish if you're young. If you're going with the oversized trend and you're an adult, you're not maximizing your aesthetic.  Wear clothing that fits your body. But you don't want things to be too tight. You need strategically snug clothing targeting the chest and arms.

Poor-fitting pants. Tight pants are a deal-breaker, and baggy pants will make you look short and dumpy. Make sure you wear clothing that fits your body.

Little boy fragrance. No self-respecting man wears a body spray. He also doesn't wear the same fragrance that his girlfriend's ex-boyfriend wore. Find a fragrance that's unique and not overpowering.

Massive belt buckles. Do not wear huge belt buckles, even if they're Gucci. Do not wear over-the-top belts either. Anson Belt & Buckle is what you should opt for all day, every day. Check out my murdered-out Anson.

Cheap suits. Adult men do not wear cheap suits. Understand that it doesn't have to be expensive but needs to fit properly. Do not wear weird colors with thin lapels. There's a huge difference in suit construction and quality, so I recommend Suit Supply. You can find them for $400 to $500; they will fit you better and look more elegant.

Baseball hats. Don't wear any dirty baseball hats. Yes, wearing them backward will make you more youthful, but I'm softening my opinion on not wearing them backward. Do not ever wear them to one side, however. That looks horrible.

Board shorts. No self-respective man will wear board shorts. These come down past the knee and are inappropriate. Swimwear should be 5 to 7 in, maybe 8 in max. But if shorts come down and touch your knee, it's absolutely a deal breaker.

Cargo shorts. No man wears cargo shorts that are big and baggy.

Crossbody bags. Younger dudes wear these, but adult dudes don't. Adult dudes also don't wear fanny packs.

String backpacks. Little boys use these, but men don't.

Pink and blue hair. There's an epidemic of guys thinking it's a great idea to dye their hair a weird color. If you're trying to express yourself, that's fine. But if you want to be respected by other people and viewed as a responsible man, don't do it.

Facial piercings & tattoos. Some guys can get away with it, but they are the badass type who doesn't care or give a crap. They must have jobs and careers that these piercings and tattoos don't matter. But most of us need to be respected by others.

Offensive graphic t-shirts or socks. If you have clothing with pot leaves on it, you're an idiot. It's not funny. If you want to offend everybody, go for it. But if you want to be respected and revered as a man who is confident and responsible, do not wear immature crap.

Immature ties. An adult dude should never wear these.

Headphones. If you're rocking these all the time, it's not a good look.

Tech watch. No self-respecting adult dude rocks a tech watch.

Glasses that suck. Glasses matter, and they can elevate your appearance. Upgrade them.

No restraint with accessorizing. An aspect that separates men from boys is restraint regarding accessorizing. Young dudes will overdo it with too many items. Less is more. For one watch, a ring or two, a chain, and that's it.

Suit bling. Tie bars, tie pins, lapel flowers, and pocket squares are items that men don't wear. They do not wear a matching tie and pocket square combos. It's just a fact. Seeing this lets me know a guy has zero clue about style.

Mom picked it out. A man never wears clothing his dad's girlfriend, mother, or grandmother bought him. It doesn't look good.

You'll need protein such as the vanilla Quest that I use. It mixes quickly and doesn't have a pungent taste. I also use orange juice that's low in sugar, almond milk, chia seeds, ice, and psyllium husks. You'll also need a blender, which I love my Ninja smoothie bowl (found on Amazon for about $100). I add about a half cup of orange juice, one scoop of the Quest protein, which has about 24 to 25 g of protein, two drops of vitamin D, one tablespoon of chia seeds, and one tablespoon of psyllium husks. In the video, I go over the specific benefits of each. Now blend.

I drink this every day for my colon health. You need the fiber, and the shake also provides protein, vitamin D, antioxidants, fatty acids, and crunch. It will keep you regular, help regulate blood sugar, maintain your abs, and build muscle‚Äîand the best part is that it's delicious! You could use chocolate protein and omit that orange juice. You can also add cocoa powder while omitting the orange juice. It's an incredible breakfast that you can play around with to power pack your morning.

Over the past four years, I have killed the Alpha M. YouTube channel by not focusing on creating better content. I've been doing the same stuff since I started, which isn't where it's at. I've done many other things during this time, such as creating other businesses, but I should have spent more time, money, and energy figuring out and improving my content. I plan to try to fix it, which isn't going to be fast, but I'm not going anywhere. I love making content as much as I did when I started, but I lost the ability to think outside the box. I have a plan, but I don't know if it will work. But I have to try something different because what I've been doing isn't working.

HOW I KILLED THE ALPHA M. CHANNEL: About four years ago, the world shut down, and people's viewing habits changed. What they were interested in hearing and learning about changed, and the issue is that I didn't. I stayed in my box and bubble. I kept talking about the same subjects and doing the same videos. I didn't grow, and this is fundamental. I also didn't invest my time, energy, and resources to figure out what the next chapter of my life on the internet would look like. I also didn't assess what other people were interested in. I meet many people who say they used to watch my content, but they don't say that they're watching it currently. I directed them over to my Alpha Mpire channel, but once again, I tried another channel instead of investing in the Alpha M. channel. The Alpha Mpire is not a mistake because there is a place for my entrepreneurial skill set and making money experiences, but it's completely different than the five pillars that I focus on the Alpha M. channel: style, grooming, fitness, relationships, and lifestyle.


WHAT I NEED TO DO: I still love making videos daily. I'm excited about creating content but not about doing the same thing and expecting different results. I need to stop micromanaging and get out of the way so people can help me. Micromanaging stifles growth and success. I can't do this by myself anymore. I've tried, but I just can't. I must be smart enough to realize it's time to ask for help. So this is step one. Despite everything I know about business and how to grow and build a team, I'm embarrassed and ashamed that I didn't do this sooner. I know this process will not be fast or overnight, and I'm in it for the long term. I want to make videos in the next 5 to 10 years, helping guys feel better and look better. This is why I started in the first place. There's nothing more important in my life than you and this channel. Thank you for everything, and hopefully, we can get things figured out sooner rather than later.

YOU! I NEED YOUR HELP:¬† So here's my plan: I want to hire five of you, perhaps more and perhaps less, to build a creative team to start the process of revamping, retooling, and figuring Alpha M. out again. It's a paid position that requires an audition. Email me at¬†workwithalpham@gmail.com¬†with five video topics, titles, ideas, and/or strategies. I'm not trying to dictate what I want to see or what you should bring to the table. I want to see what sparks my interest and makes me want to watch. I'll decide whether it's engaging, interesting, or something special. I also need help with thumbnail ideation. I don't need somebody to do the thumbnails; I need creative ideas for the thumbnails and for the videos‚Äîclickable, engaging, and exciting thumbnails. at¬†workwithalpham@gmail.com¬†with five video topics, titles, ideas, and/or strategies.

Not wearing a watch. A watch is the greatest accessory for a man. But this isn't the solution if you're wearing a technology watch. You will look average in basic in it. Take 30% off all Aura watches and straps (41mm, too) with code AlphaM.


No accessories. Accessories can elevate your style and make you come across better aesthetically. Whether a ring, bracelet, watch, or corn necklace, you can set yourself apart.


Dad bod. There's nothing sexy about a dad bod. If you want to look great out of your clothes, you need to work out.


No facial hair. If you don't have anything on your face, you will look soft and doughy unless you have super strong features. Also, don't cut off your sideburns. Sideburns help frame your face and finish your hairstyle unless you have a bald fade.


Hats 100%. If you wear hats all the time and in every environment, it's a thumbs down.


Visible undershirt. If you can see it, it's bad.


An untucked dress shirt that's too long. If your dress shirt is coming down past your crotch, you look boring and basic because that's what boring basic dads do. Remember there's a difference between casual shirt designs that are meant to be untucked and dress shirts that you're supposed to wear tucked in.


Sports paraphernalia. If your shirt has a logo, like a college sports team, it's boring and basic. Sports paraphernalia doesn't make you look stylish.


Boring shoes. Boat shoes, bad athletic sneakers with anything other than athletic wear, and dress shoes with sneaker bottoms are all thumbs-down.


Clothing that doesn't fit. You need clothing that fits your body. Don't wear baggy clothing, baggy suits, or anything else oversized. You need clothing that gives you a style hug. Also, untapered pants should be tailored and tapered. Whether jeans, khakis, or chinos, they should not bunch at your ankles. And regarding shirts, always look for a slim fit. You shouldn't wear skin-tight shirts, but they should not be cut boxy. 


Tighty whities. Basic underwear and boxers get thumbs down. If you want to go boxer brief, black is okay.


Pathetic polo shirts. Big patterns like stripes are horrible, and country club logos are also a no-go. Also, I'd like to add Tommy Bahama to the list. Certain brands, like Brooks Brothers, make you look boring and basic. If you know what you're doing at Brooks Brothers, you can be okay with it if you have clothing that fits properly and is coordinated (old-money aesthetic).


Not dressing for the occasion. You should always aim for one level up. If the levels are already up, like for a wedding or a formal function, you want to ensure your clothing is tailored.

Today, I will discuss my picks for the three quickest, easiest, and sexiest men's hairstyles that ladies absolutely love. Coincidentally, these hairstyles look good on every guy. The other upside is that they all require very little maintenance and don't take much time to style. First, here are some terms to know. Tapering refers to cutting the hair shorter as it goes down your head. Fading is a type of taper because the hair goes from short to long but will be cut shorter. You often hear about skin fades, bald fades, or low fades. Typically, this will go from very short to a little bit longer, and you'll be able to see a hard line of hair. There's no transition from short to longer. Texturizing your hair is giving your hair different lengths in specific regions using thinning shears. You could also do razoring, a technique for giving your hair more texture by cutting different lengths in the crown. Another type of texturizing is point cutting. Standard cutting removes length, making everything the same length. It will be more blunt. Point cutting involves taking the scissors vertically and skipping over different areas to give your hair different lengths to create more texture and volume. This will also give more definition and separation.
T
Styles that look good on every dude

Textured crew cut. This is not a buzz cut that takes everything to one length and is super short on the crown (it can be a bald fade or skin fade to give more structure and symmetry). Most guys don't look good with a completely shaved head. The crew cut is better because there are a lot of variations in length. You could choose a Caesar, French crop, or a messy textured top with short, tapered sides. Buzz cuts look good on guys with prominent, strong features who don't have a double chin. A buzz cut will make your head look more round. Add a bit of facial hair if you have strong features and want to elevate them to the next level. Facial hair such as a light beard, a stash, or something on the chin will help to balance the face and give a bit more attitude and edge. The crew cut will give attitude and edge and is low maintenance. These do require regular haircuts.

Side part. This hairstyle is versatile and works with any face shape and hairline. Whether you have a widow's peak or are receding, different styling products and lengths on top are options. The length should range anywhere between 2 to 6 in. The sides should be tapered, but you can opt for a faded side part, which requires more visits to a barber or stylist to keep it looking fresh. A taper is a bit longer on top, shorter by ears, and will last longer. You can typically wait 4 to 8 weeks between cuts with a taper. If you wait 6 to 8 weeks, trim around your ears and the back of your neck. A side part is a great style for growing your hair because it's a clean and polished look.

Textured flow. This is the best hairstyle that's out there. It looks great on pretty much every guy. The medium-length flow has a ton of different variations and options. You could go with a center or a side part, but the bottom line is you're letting your hair grow. You need to go for regular trims every two weeks, but generally, it's a low-maintenance style. You don't need to spend much time styling or drying it. Apply sea salt spray out of the shower and then a low-shine product like a hair cream or hair clay. Run the product through your hair and then push your hair into place. Later in the day, break up the pieces as the hair dries. The hairstyle is deliberately messy. Air-dried, the style will give you more of a rugged and manly look. This style is good for anybody as long as you don't have super thin or fine hair.

One aspect that separates boys from men is where they live. You can elevate your aesthetic easily, but one room of the house is the last frontier for a boy to become a man. It's the bathroom. Even if your place is straight, if she comes over to freshen up, and your bathroom is disgusting, she's going to be turned off. I want to help you manage the bathroom because it will truly separate the men from the boys. Pay attention to the space so that you're not a savage in the bathroom

Toilet. If it's disgusting, you need to fix that. Make sure you have extra toilet paper and wet wipes. Ensure your porcelain throne is clean, meaning it does not have pee around the ring or floor. You should also not have splatters in the bowl, including the toilet seat's underside. Clean up after every time you've used it. It's very important not to have a nasty trashcan as well. Use a bag so the bottom of the trash can doesn't get disgusting with gum, nasty hair, and funky stuff. An overflowing trash can is gross.

Towels. You don't need a fresh towel every time you get out of the shower, but you must ensure it's cleaned regularly. Have a few towels to rotate them, and store them under the sink or in your cabinet. Always have a fresh towel ready for her, and make sure it's classic, classic, and manly. Also, you need to have a towel by the sink for wiping up after you get done spitting and rinsing.

Bathmat. A lot of times, boys don't think about a bathmat. You need one when you get out of the shower so you don't slip and fall. It also helps to absorb the moisture off your feet so you don't track footprints around your bathroom. Also, have a bathmat underneath your sink to elevate the aesthetic and bring richness and texture to your bathroom. A bathroom can be a bit bland and blase, but you can elevate it with some art.

Toothbrush. A manual toothbrush doesn't clean your teeth as well as a sonic toothbrush. I use a Laifen Wave, the best I've ever used. It's affordable as well. With oscillation, it cleans your teeth better, which reduces the amount of plaque that builds up in your teeth. Your breath won't stink.

Mirror and counters. Make sure that your mirror is not covered with splatters and spit. Also, make sure your counter shouldn't be cluttered with a bunch of crap all over the place.

Drawers and cabinets. You need to have a place for everything in your drawers and cabinets. At the dollar store, you can find bins to separate all your stuff. You can use containers for skin care, some for hair products, another container for deodorant, and similar items. Make sure your drawers are tidy, clean, and organized. Just don't throw things in and have them scattered.

Hand soap. You should have some hand soap next to your sink and a towel to dry your hands.
Sink drain. The sink drain should be cleaned and should not have a bunch of funky hair and crap and crusty nasty stuff around it.

Floor. The floor should not have pubes from your manscaping or beard stubble from your shaving. It also shouldn't have hair on it. Sweep it up, or it can be a deal-breaker and turn off. I do my beard grooming and manscaping in the shower, so clean-up is easy. I also have a mirror in there to help me do my business.

Shower. Ensure your shower is clean and free of grime, mildew, and soap stains. You should have a body puff or a sponge for showering, but change those out because they can get nasty and build up bacteria. The bottom line is that your shower should be as clean as possible, including the drain.

Can you age backward or in reverse? Can you undo the damage created from earlier years to look and feel younger as you get older? The answer is yes, and I will share those ways to reverse the aging process. Keep in mind the two ages: biological and chronological. Chronological is how long you've been alive, and biological is how old your body is. The good news is that you can often be younger than your chronological age. Conversely, you can also be much older biologically than you are chronologically. Here's how to reduce your biological age:

Prioritize sleep. Sleeping is your body's way of repairing itself at a cellular level. That's why you need a moisturizer at night. Muscles also repair at night during sleep. Sleep improves cognition and helps you remember and recall. Sleep will also boost your immune system.

Maintain proper hormone levels. Testosterone is critical for you to look and feel amazing. As men age, testosterone drops at about 1% per year. Keep your testosterone levels up by adjusting your lifestyle to facilitate proper hormone regulation and production. Get a test to see your level and then boost it naturally. Improve your sleep, increase your exercise, and take supplements such as vitamin D, magnesium, zinc, and L-carnitine. Strength training is also critical for increasing testosterone. You should have a blood panel done every year to make sure all levels are in line.

Maintain muscle mass. Either maintain or gain muscle mass because as we age, we lose muscle. It's part of the process, but if you want to reverse that, workout with heavy weights. Exercising also helps to improve brain function and cognitive thinking. It reduces chronic inflammation and helps reduce stress. BONUS: If you're under chronic stress, you will age prematurely. You won't sleep well, you're more apt to eat crappy food, cortisone levels increase, and weight will be gained. Meditate, sleep well, engage in yoga, or find another way to live less stressful.

Health conscious diet. Eat a heart-healthy diet filled with whole grains, good vegetables, fibrous carbohydrates, lean proteins, and good fats. Omega-3, omega-6, and omega-9 are also critical. Ensure your LDL cholesterol is managed because if it rises, your arteries can clog, potentially increasing your risk of a cardiac event. Reduce or eliminate alcohol consumption because it also raises LDL and contributes to other bad effects on the body. Stop smoking completely because it will make you look like crap, yellow your teeth, and make you look old. Eating healthy will help to eliminate man boobs and love handles, which also make you age faster.

Stimulate your brain. Whether or not it's through crossword puzzles, working, reading, or doing arithmetic activities, make your brain work. Don't contribute to mental decline by not working your brain. Consume healthy content and information rather than feeding your brain crap and giving it dopamine hits.

Wear sunscreen. Eighty percent of skin aging is due to UV rays. Sure, the sun provides vitamin D, but you should wear sunscreen daily because skin cancer is no joke. No matter your skin tone, you need to protect yourself. Start taking care of your skin as soon as possible. Start now. Tiege Hanley has all you need to get started with their Level One routine.

I discussed dressing age-appropriately, but most of the time, it's regarding older guys trying to dress too young. Dressing young makes them look super weird and awkward. It looks like they're trying too hard.But on the flip side, you can also dress too old. I would like to discuss what makes you look like an old man. All the items I will cover make you look like a dad or a grandpa. You should never wear these to look like a young and stylish dude. If you wear any of these, you will look like your dad -- or grandpa!


Ankle socks. Ankle socks with a band will likely be worn with unstylish shoes like boat shoes.


Boat shoes. They suck!


Athletic shoes. You should not wear athletic footwear or running shoes in an unathletic environment. You will look like you're wearing old dad sneakers. You see them -- big and bulky New Balance sneakers like Dads wear. They're not stylish.


Comfort dress shoes. These are the mullets of shoes, like those from Cole Haan. The top may be a brogued Oxford that's leather with an athletic soul on the bottom. They are definitely not stylish.


Mandels. The strappy sandals that you'll see old dudes wearing.


Blazers with metal buttons. Nothing more than a metal button blazer will make you look like an old dude. My favorite blazers come from Collars and Co. and have a lot of stretch and a slim fit.


Baggy suit jackets. Any jacket that's too big and baggy will make you look old.¬† Wear a jacket that fits your body.


Old man polos. Whether striped or have weird patterns, they are not stylish, even though they may be fun and functional. Instead, try a Collars and Co. polo with a nice collar that can be dressed up or down. It's not striped like a little boy's polo or with weird patterns like¬†

Grandpa's. It also doesn't have a country club logo on the chest.


Dad jeans. These will be pulled up high and be a bit baggy. They have a regular rise and are very relaxed. These are horrible.


Jorts. Long jean shorts (jorts) are usually worn with an ugly T-shirt and a fanny pack. These are usually paired with athletic or casual footwear for running around Disney World. Don't do it!


Baggy cargo shorts. These will automatically make you look like an old man because of all the storage pockets (and the stuff you put in them).


Costco clothing. Sure, sometimes you can get some deals on nice items, but the truth is that most of them will make you look like a dad.


Big and baggy pants hiked up. Any big, baggy pants pulled up too high will make you look good, dork. You want to ensure your pants have their appropriate rise and are not too long. If they're too long, your legs will look super short. You want to ensure that you're not getting a bunch of fabric when you reach down. Your pants should also not be puddling at your ankles. Have your pants tailored so you do not have big and wide legs.


Pleated khakis. Younger dudes can sometimes pull off wearing pleated khakis, but for most of us, a much better option is flat-front pants.


Baggy suits. Old dudes wear big baggie suits. Make sure you have your clothing tailored.


Matching pocket square and tie. Make sure they do not match. The classic old dude wears a pocket square and tie that came in a set from his kids.


Fun clothing. They are not stylish, whether it's fun ties, fun socks, or fun t-shirts. They are old.

I get a lot of emails inquiring how to solve certain grooming issues, and the other day, I received one about a guy who shaved off his widow's peak. He wanted to know how he could reduce the appearance of that stubble growing in. My answer was to let it go back and never do that again. In some places on your body, you should never shave with a razor because it will look stupid or get super irritated. Today, I want to review some places you should never shave. Several tools are an option for hair removal, including tweezers, waxing, and shaving. Tweezing can be painful because it removes the hair from the root. Waxing will keep it from growing back as quickly. And shaving is affordable but not permanent. You'll have stubble almost instantly because it produces the fattest cross-section of the hair. Shaving can also create ingrown hairs. Another option is trimming. It doesn't allow the hair to get ingrown, so depending on the area, this is a preferred and ideal method. One more note is that men look better with facial hair. It makes them look more rugged, manly, and sexy. If you don't have to shave your facial hair, don't. Leave some stubble, which will make you look more sexy. Just make sure it's well-maintained and groomed. Never shave these areas:


Widow's peak. You'll see instant stubble, especially the darker your hair. You want to leave your hairline as natural as possible.


Half mustache. Don't shave half of your mustache. I see dudes doing this, but they should leave it as natural as possible. Follow the growth pattern.


Unnatural beard. Never shave your beard in any unnatural shape, such as thin. Also don't let it grow too high on your cheeks either because you look like a wolf. But do make sure you edge well. Don't go against the grain; use a single pass with a safety or single-blade razor.


Neck. If you get ingrown hairs, bumps, or burns, reduce the occurrence by using a single-blade or cheap, disposable razor. Don't use a cartridge razor. That's why I use my Brio Zero Blade.


Under the chin. Never shave under the chin because you look like you have a double chin or a weak jaw. Check out my demonstration on how to determine where to shave this area.


Eyebrows. I've discussed this before, but never use a razor on your eyebrows. You'll end up seeing a fat cross-section of the hair, so you'll look like you have 5:00 stubble on your brows. You can also get ingrown hairs and razor burns on your eyebrows, which look terrible. Use a tweezer instead.


Pubes. Never shave your pubes with a razor. It's extremely uncomfortable in the sensitive area, and then wearing pants will further increase the likelihood of ingrown hairs, burns, and bumps. If you want to go bald eagle, consider a racing stripe. Or take it short without taking the hair below the skin, which causes ingrown hairs and irritations. Testicles and the base of your wiener should always be shaved, IMO.


Butt cheeks and crack. Removing hair down past the skin's surface can grow back trapped. You'll end up with ingrown hairs. If you've ever shaved your butt cheeks, it starts to grow back itchy and prickly. It's uncomfortable. Instead, grab a Brio and run it up your butt cheeks and then grab a cheek and open up a bit. Just be careful of your rosebud.

Not hanging with undisciplined people. Who you surround yourself with is critical to your success. If you're around a bunch of losers, chances are, you will also be. Discipline is similar because undisciplined people procrastinate and aren't motivated to do the work. 

Undisciplined people are less likely to stay on their journey because they're influenced when witnessing others undisciplined. It's difficult to shake and overcome when you align yourself with undisciplined people. It's a lot easier, uplifting, and motivating to be aligned in terms of your discipline.

Create your best environment. My office has helped me be more disciplined because I know it means business, and it's motivating. I can't work in clutter and chaos; I can't focus. You need to love your environment, whether in a city, around people, in an office, or otherwise. There's no way to be as disciplined in an uninviting environment. The environment dramatically impacts your ability to be disciplined and focused.

Limit cell phone accessibility. This is a big one. We're picking up our cell phones all day and have become conditioned to grab and look at them. It doesn't matter what you're checking; if you need to get things done, put your phone away. If you put it far away, you're not as tempted because the cell phone is literally the discipline devil. The more you can eliminate it from your environment when focusing and working, the better. Putting it away has helped my mindset, focus, and clarity.

Nootropics. I heard about his nootropic from Joe Rogan's podcast and tried it. It didn't make me feel like it should, so I've been researching it more. I found a company, Thesis, which is badass. You can customize your own starter kit. Nootropics are natural compounds that help your brain work better in different areas.

Realize the price of procrastination. When you wait to do something, there's a price to pay, and sometimes the price can be huge. If you don't just sit down and get it done, you end up taking away a lot of fun from other things because you're thinking about what you should have been doing. Go ahead and do what you need to now to enjoy yourself later.

Schedule downtown. In this hustle culture, people constantly grind it out and feel guilty if they're not being completely productive. But if you don't take time for yourself, you won't be as productive or mentally sharp. You need to allow your brain to rest, so you need some relaxation and fun as part of your equation. Schedule downtime.

Focus on the process instead of the end result. Having a North Star and knowing what you're working for is good, but enjoy and embrace the process. Work will always be work, but there's a difference between working for something you enjoy and being disciplined about it versus doing something you hate. Life is too short to do something you hate.

Live simply. I'm not super exciting, going to many places and always eating out. I like to work but also enjoy having a very rigid schedule. I like structure, which will benefit you too. This year, I visited two super bougie locations: Aspen and The Cloister. Aspen's style was 'new money,' with prevalent brand names and logos. The 'new money' style in Aspen was all about flash and letting people know that they had money by wearing expensive clothing. However, in contrast, the Cloister expressed style in an understated and refined way. The 'old money' style was more understated elegance because they didn't need to show off or brag that they had money. Here are staple 'old money' style items to incorporate into your wardrobe: 

Natural-looking hair. Skin fades are not a thing. Hair styles are a lot more preppy and old-school, such as combovers, slickbacks, and side parts. Hairstyles are more natural, longer, and more like a bro flow.

Classic style sunglasses. Styles like a Clubmaster, Aviator, or Wayfarer are 'old money.' There is no flamboyance in the sunglasses.

Luxury timepiece. Classic watches like a Rolex are premium but also understated. They are not super flashy. There's no bling, and the watches are not decked out. 'Old money' is more elegant, and sometimes heirlooms are passed down from generation to generation.

Button-down white oxford. Whether short or long sleeves, a white oxford is an 'old money' style must-have. They look great paired with shorts or even a swimsuit. You can rock them with chinos and tuck them in to go to dinner.

Polo shirt. You need a clean, classic, and crisp polo, like from Collars and Co., which features dress shirt type collars.

Subdued color palette. You'll see a lot of whites, creams, tans, and khakis with an 'old money' aesthetic. You'll also see paler shades, such as pale yellows, pale pinks, and lighter blues.

Tailored suit. The tailoring of a suit as an 'old money' aesthetic is flawless. The fabric will be more interesting as well. The suits drape better than a cheap suit, and the thread count is high so that it moves and lays nicely. It drapes properly because of the thread count.

Chino's all day, every day. An 'old-money' aesthetic is chinos in tan, light blue, pink, and other lighter fabrics. Make sure that they're more tailored but look casual.

Loafers. They are an amazing option for 'old money' aesthetic. Suede is a popular option.

Thinner belt. 'Old money' belts are smaller, thinner, and subtler, and options include braided, golf, alligator, or other leather.

Minimal leather sneakers. The gum sole gives a more classic look. Playful colors and suede are also popular.

Short and patterned bathing suits. The bathing suits are typically short and have a playful pattern. They do not opt for board shorts.

PRODUCT CHOICES + WHAT THEY DO


Sea salt spray. Sea salt spray is a pre-styler that adds texture and volume to hair, making it look like it has life.


Texturizing powder. This product will make it look like you don't have any product in your hair. Texture Powder is amazing on dry hair or hair that you just applied sea salt spray (then dried). You can periodically restyle your hair throughout the day with texture powder. It holds up well to heat without melting or going flat and is a matte product.


Thickening and texturizing cream. This product is perfect for a guy who doesn't want to look like he has a product in his hair. THICK Cream gives a little hold with low shine and is also relatively light. 


Hair cream. This is a lighter-hold product with a bit of a shiny glow without looking wet or like a gel. Hair Cream is good for longer hair, rocking the bro flow. It allows your hair to look natural and healthy.


Smooth. This leave-in hair conditioner is a perfect product to help with flyaways and frizz.


Curl cream. This product is recommended for guys with curly hair who want a natural look that's not wet, oily, or crunchy. Curl Cream will make curls more pronounced without being hard, crunchy, oily, or greasy. It will add texture and smooth flyaways.


Hair paste. This product has a stronger but moderate hold and is a bit shinier than cream or a leave-in conditioner. Hair Paste is perfect for medium to long hairstyles that are pushed back or want a bit of shine. It allows for manageability, so your hair can move around, and you can run your fingers through it. You can reset and reposition hair, too.


Hair clay. These are pretty popular and allow for medium hold and low shine. Applying Hair Clay to wet hair will make it look shiny and wet until the hair strands are broken up (messed up with your hands). You can also use a hair dryer to do this. How you style your hair will make a big difference.


Hair pomade. This is the OG of hair styling products. Hair Pomade has a stronghold and a bit of shine for slick-back or come-over styles. Pomades are typically better for shorter styles. Make sure you select one that's water-based, as some pomades are non-water-based and very difficult to get out of your hair.


Hair putty. It's incredibly versatile, with high hold and low shine. Sometimes, Hair Putty is challenging to dig out of the container, but emulsification softens it. Put it into dry hands, as it won't emulsify with damp hands.


Gel. With maximum shine and hold, GELous will make your hair crunchy and wet-looking. If you're looking for a super shiny and spiky 


Hairspray. I don't recommend hairspray often because it stiffens hair and doesn't allow for natural movement.

On average, an adult makes 35,000 different decisions per day. Most of these decisions are subconscious or intuitive. But the reality is that most decisions we make are not a big deal and won't impact our lives. They are insignificant to the greater picture. But these six, in my opinion, are the ones that will truly change who you are fundamentally.

The choice of who to love. The decision to love yourself sounds basic and simple but many of us do self-destructive things. You should not allow people to take advantage of you, allow your body to go to sh!t, spend so much time on social media surfing, and more. You need to make decisions that take care of yourself and make yourself a priority. Who you allow into your life and surround yourself with is also very powerful. It will indicate where you go in life. Don't choose to love somebody that doesn't deserve you or marry somebody you shouldn't. Do not allow others to treat you poorly. We choose how we let people treat us. If we're choosing to allow them to walk all over us, we're allowing them to pull us down.

The choice of who you spend your life with. Would you rather be single and happy or with somebody & miserable? Life is a lot harder and more challenging when you're with the wrong person. But if you're with somebody who truly gets, supports, and loves you, you can build a life with this person. This doesn't mean the road is simple or easy. You will have issues to work through. The choice to have children will also significantly and immeasurably impact your life. Make sure you have protected sex until you're ready to have kids. Having children will change the rest of your life; then, you must choose to be the best father you can be. It doesn't matter what your father was like. You can change someone's life, which will change your world.

The choice to work through your sh!t. If you're having a difficult time dealing with baggage from your past, failures, and other crap that is preventing you from being free, you need to sit down on that baggage. Therapy is an amazing tool. Happiness is a choice, and you can make that choice to choose happiness. You deserve to be happy.

The choice of what to do for a living. What you want for your job is a big choice. Realize that this is not locked down. It can change. You need to find happiness and fulfillment in a career and make changes the sooner that you can. It's critical that you find something you love doing, but that doesn't necessarily mean it will be easy. Don't work just for a paycheck or because it's expected of you. Do not live for somebody else. Choose a job that's inspiring or makes you excited. Life is too short to hate what you're doing for all the hours that you put in at work.

The choice to be healthy. You need to take care of your body, which is one of the most important things you'll ever choose to do. What you feed your brain is equally important. From information education to media to news to social media, it can either make you a sheep or make you more intelligent and well-rounded. Don't be a sheep. Follow your own direction. Look at life through a critical lens. Be analytical and decipher what you believe.

The choice of what kind of man you want to be. This choice will impact who you date, how you allow people to treat you, how you treat others, and more. Do you choose to be a man of integrity and good character? Are you a man who is honorable and noble? Do you do what is right instead of what is easy? Do you treat people well?

You can get away with making bad decisions and being stupid in your teens because that's what teenagers do. And then men start to figure things out in their 20s, whether or not it's who they are or what they want in life.By the 30s, men have a clear direction of where they want to go, but they can't be stupid anymore. They have to be smart enough to realize a few things. Here they are.

No one's coming to save you. By 30 years old, you're a man. If you're still living with your parents, it's time to get your own place. It's time to have your own car, get a job, and not rely on handouts.

Stop taking things personally. Younger men feel like everything is directed at them.

The world doesn't revolve around you. Many men think everyone is judging them or worrying about what others think. The truth is, people aren't thinking about you. Take that off the table.

Take risks. If you play it safe, you'll never truly excel at anything.

Stop hanging out with losers. If you want to do amazing things and someday be great, you must stop hanging out with people who aren't going anywhere. You are the average of the five closest people you spend the most time with. If these people are losers, you need to break the cycle and break away from them. Break away from those who don't deserve your time. Shed people who don't deserve your energy or friendship, who are butchers or leeches, and those who are toxic. You need to protect yourself if you're going to ascend or truly be the man you desire.

Take care of your brand and being. Your image is something that, when you're younger, doesn't matter. You dress like a punk. When you get older, you understand what you're putting into the world regarding your appearance and image. This includes your scent, body language, and the way you communicate. People form an opinion of you in the first 3 seconds based solely on your nonverbal communication, including how you stand, shake hands, make eye contact, and smell (here's your new signature scent, ICON). Also, stop doing dumb stuff to your body and clean up your act. Make sure you're not eating trash, not boozing, and destroying your body. Make sure you're going to the gym and protecting your health. Don't smoke or do drugs. Don't sleep with dirty senoritas.

Listen more and talk less. Don't boast, brag, and run your mouth. You need to listen. If somebody is talking, and they are where you want to go or where you want to be, listen harder. These people are not your competition; they are your assets and educational tools. It's not about being jealous; it's about being humble and smart enough to realize that others know more than you.

Pretty doesn't mean good. Also, realize that just because someone's prettier and attractive doesn't mean that they're a good person. Don't give your attention, money, affection, or love to somebody who doesn't deserve it.

Be happy with yourself. Stop watching p^rn, simping, and scrolling Instagram and TikTok. They do nothing for you. You'll be happier with yourself. Further, be the person you should be to have a happy and healthy relationship. You need to do the deep work and overcome things holding you back. Forgive people who have wronged you, including yourself. Do not harbor resentment or hold on to the past.

You're not guaranteed tomorrow. Treat each day as a precious gift. By 30, have a good idea of where you want to go and start solidifying that path and plan. Know your North Star and change your direction if it's wrong. Don't waste time because time goes super fast.

There are dangerous people in this world who will try to manipulate and control you.

So today you‚Äôll learn 8 signs someone might be gaslighting you.

One important thing to remember, gaslighting is a pattern. Especially with some of the more subtle signs from later in the video, seeing them once doesn‚Äôt necessarily mean you‚Äôre being gaslit. But be wary if you see these signs repeatedly.

We‚Äôll be using Jussie Smollett as our example.  For those of you who missed out, in 2019 he claimed to have been a victim of a hate crime.  But his story quickly fell apart in ways that are instructive for catching narcissistic liars in your own life.

CANTIDADES:

**Receta de tortillas de harina**
- 3 tazas (400 g) de harina de trigo
- ¬Ω taza (100 g) de manteca vegetal
- 1 cdta (6 g) de sal
- ¬æ a 1 taza de agua caliente

Mezclar la harina con la sal e integrar la manteca vegetal hasta que tengamos una mezcla que parezca arena h√∫meda. Luego a√±adir agua caliente y mezclar hasta que tengamos una masa blandita. Amasar por 8 minutos y dividir en 12 bolitas para luego dejarlas reposar por 20 minutos cubiertas. Despu√©s de ese tiempo, se aplanan para tener unas tortillas medianas. Pasar a un comal a fuego medio y calentar 30 segundos por lado. Voltear 3 veces.


**Receta Arroz con Mantequilla**
- 1 taza (223 g) de arroz blanco
- 2 tazas (500 ml) de caldo de pollo preparado.
- 2 cdas (29 g) de mantequilla sin sal

Pasar el arroz a una olla chica junto con el caldo de pollo y la mantequilla. Hervir y luego dejar la llama a fuego bajo por 15 a 20 minutos. Apagar el fuego cuando ya no se escuche el agua burbujeando y el arroz est√© cocido. 


**Salsa Roja de Tomatillo**
- 8 tomatillos cocidos
- 1 pu√±o de chile de √°rbol hidratado.
- 4 ajos crudos
- Sal al gusto

Cocer los chiles de √°rbol hasta que est√©n blanditos y los tomatillos hasta que cambien ligeramente de color. Esto ser√° aproximadamente 5 minutos de cocci√≥n. Luego pasar los chiles y los tomatillos a la licuadora junto con los ajos y la sal. A√±adir agua natural si es necesario hasta conseguir la consistencia deseada.

**Toppings Adicionales**
- Carnitas de cerdo de tu preferencia
- Queso Cheddar rallado al gusto

channel.name: The Rock
channel.description:
The official YouTube channel for Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson & Seven Bucks Digital Studios.  

Dwayne Johnson is best known for his films such as Disney‚Äôs Jungle Cruise, Universal‚Äôs Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs and Shaw, Sony‚Äôs Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle, Legendary‚Äôs Skyscraper, Paramount's Baywatch, Warner Brother's San Andreas, and more! Seven Bucks Productions original television productions include NBC‚Äôs The Titan Games, HBO‚Äôs Ballers, BET‚Äôs Finding Justice, Paramount Network‚Äôs Rock the Troops and HBO Documentary Films‚Äô Rock and a Hard Place.

Find a variety of content including series like The Rock Reacts and Q&A Time, Project Rock training videos brought to you by Under Armour, and exclusive clips and trailers teasing Dwayne's movie and television projects.

videos.title: Moana 2 | Moana is Back!
videos.description:
Moana is back üå∫üêö
 
Tickets are on sale now everywhere tickets are sold for Walt Disney Animation Studios‚Äô epic animated musical ‚ÄúMoana 2.‚Äù Opening in theaters on Nov. 27, 2024, the all-new feature film reunites Moana (voice of Auli‚Äòi Cravalho) and Maui (voice of Dwayne Johnson) for an expansive new voyage alongside a crew of unlikely seafarers.
 
In addition to Cravalho and Johnson, the voice cast of ‚ÄúMoana 2‚Äù includes HualƒÅlai Chung, Rose Matafeo, David Fane, Awhimai Fraser, Khaleesi Lambert-Tsuda, Temuera Morrison, Nicole Scherzinger, Rachel House, Gerald Ramsey and Alan Tudyk, who returns as Heihei. Directed by David Derrick Jr., Jason Hand and Dana Ledoux Miller, and produced by Christina Chen and Yvett Merino, ‚ÄúMoana 2‚Äù features music by Grammy¬Æ winners Abigail Barlow and Emily Bear, Grammy nominee Opetaia Foa‚Äòi, and three-time Grammy winner Mark Mancina. Jared Bush and Miller are writing the film, which is executive produced by Jennifer Lee, Bush and Johnson.

Grab your tickets: https://bit.ly/Moana2Tix

videos.description: It's time to save Christmas! Tickets for #RedOneMovie are now on sale at https://bit.ly/RedOneTix. Grab yours now and see the movie only in theaters November 15, with early access screenings on November 10.
videos.author: The Rock

videos.title: Meeting a crying fan ü•πü©µ
videos.description:
Life‚Äôs ride comes with big emotions and people cry all the time when I meet them ‚ù£Ô∏è

I‚Äôm a sucker for tears, so I‚Äôll always head back to the chaos to take care of whoever is crying.

Fame can be toxic if you don‚Äôt use it wisely, I tell my babies at home all the time that the best part of ‚Äúdaddy‚Äôs fame‚Äù is making people happy. Years ago, I didn‚Äôt understand that at first, but I feel today üëäüèæ
videos.author: The Rock

videos.title: Loretta Lynn duet with my buddy Kelly Clarkson
videos.description: When I stopped by my buddy Kelly Clarkson's show, we wanted to pay tribute to one of the Queens of country music - the Coal Miner‚Äôs Daughter, herself, Loretta Lynn. RIP Loretta üé∂‚ù§Ô∏èü•É #DontComeHomeADrinkin
videos.author: The Rock

videos.title: They say ‚ÄúNever meet your heroes‚Äù‚Ä¶
videos.description:
They say ‚ÄúNever meet your heroes‚Äù‚Ä¶

But that saying always bugged the heck outta me - because I‚Äôve always felt if you‚Äôre a ‚Äúcelebrity‚Äù of any caliber and you‚Äôre LUCKY enough to have some fame and influence - then be grateful for the position you‚Äôre in and be KIND and GOOD to people ‚Äî ESPECIALLY OUR KIDS.

Sure I‚Äôve met some a#%holes as an adult, who I was so excited to finally meet and wound up being super disappointed- but that further cemented how I feel about fame.

When I was a little boy, I finally met one of my heroes - Muhammad Ali üêê- he was so sweet and kind to me. Made a MASSIVE POSITIVE impression on me that I never forgot.

Marco - it‚Äôs great to meet you, shake your hand and give ya a hug. Keep up the great work in school and THANK YOU big man for being my biggest fan!!! ü§úüèæü§õüèº

ps, us big boys cry too üòâü•πüí™üèæ
videos.author: The Rock

videos.title: Dwayne ‚ÄòThe Rock‚Äô Johnson Surprises Apalachee High School Football Team, Attends First Home Game
videos.description:
In the wake of the school shooting at Apalachee High School on September 4th, Dwayne ‚ÄòThe Rock‚Äô Johnson planned a surprise for the football team, after losing their assistant coach in the tragedy. 

During their visit to Trilith Studios, Dwayne promised the players that he would attend their first home game after a much-needed hiatus. While at the game, Dwayne reunited with players and met some of the survivors and their families.

üé•: Jon Brandon Cruz

These players & coaches all play now with a higher purpose and greater intention.

Win or lose, they‚Äôre all undefeated in the game of life.

It was my honor to be in this room.

It‚Äôs beyond the game.

videos.title: Surprising Apalachee High School Football Team
videos.description:
Sometimes one of the best paths to begin the healing journey is through our smiles, laughter and joy.

I was blessed this past week to have the APALACHEE HIGH SCHOOL FOOTBALL TEAM come visit me at the production soundstages I‚Äôve been filming at here in Atlanta, Georgia.

As the world knows, Apalachee High School in Winder, GA, has endured the unimaginable tragedy of a mass shooting.

I didn‚Äôt know what to expect when I walked in to meet them - I was absolutely BLOWN AWAY by their spirit and energy. I looked these kids in their eyes and hugged ‚Äòem - I know they‚Äôre in great pain, but man are they resilient and staying strong.

It was as if they just needed a reason, an opportunity to just ‚Äúlet it all go‚Äù in this moment.

As we said goodbyes, the last kid I hugged said, ‚Äúwe needed this Rock‚Äù
(so did I)

I can‚Äôt begin to imagine what these players and all the students, teachers & staff of Apalachee High are going through right now, but I‚Äôm here in any and every way I can be - to give my support and love to them and their families as they begin their healing journey.

God bless you all.

We Are One Apalachee.

ps, I‚Äôm in touch with Coach Hancock and as promised, I‚Äôll be there for your first home game.

videos.title: I FINALLY got to surprise a special MMA Fighter
videos.description:
We‚Äôve never met but I had to fly to Miami to look this man Themba Gorimbo the eyes, hug him and shake his hand. I‚Äôve been moved & motivated by his story ‚ù§Ô∏è

He recently won his first fight in the UFC.

He had $7 bucks in his bank account when he won.

He sleeps on a couch in the gym.

After the fight, he sold his fight gear (trunks & gloves) on line and made $7,000. Instead of using the money to find a place to live, he built a bush pump so his village back in Zimbabwe can have clean water.

He never asked me for anything, but I just wanted to help the guy out. $7 Bucks ya know.

And I felt the MANA & emotion in every hug üòäüí™üèæ

Very good and very special day. 

#ThembaGorimbo

channel.name: Kids Channel - Cartoon Videos for Kids
channel.description: Kids Channel is an online educational platform, specializing in graphic videos, nursery rhymes and songs for children. With the help of colors and graceful movement children develop their cognitive capacities, imagination, creativity and logical reasoning. Taking preschool education to the next level our videos go beyond ABC, 123, shapes and colors we teach your preschooler moral values such as friendship, love, caring , sharing and more. Our videos bring to life the toys that your baby plays with such as cars, trucks, monster trucks and many more vehicles that bring kindergarten education to your door step, interactively teaching your toddler the alphabets, numbers and more. We have many special friends such as Little Red Car, the Haunted House Monster Truck, Monster Truck Dan and the Road Rangers take you to a special journey in each new episode. We are dedicated in nurturing young minds into young intellectuals. Let your children join the movement!

videos.title: Wheels on the Bus #trending #viral #shorts #ytshorts #youtubekids #kidschannel
videos.description:
Kids Channel is collection of fun education videos of nursery rhymes, phonics and number songs for preschool kids & babies, where they learn the names of colors, numbers, shapes, abc and more.

üåà Subscribe for free now to get notified about new videos - https://www.youtube.com/user/thekydstv?sub_confirmation=1


üåà If you enjoyed this collection, you may also like these compilations:

üåàCheck out our Partner Featured Videos:

We have a nursery rhymes, songs and videos for every occasion here at Kids Channel. With home to many cartoon 2D and 3D characters, we are a preschooler's best friend. Through stories, episodes, original songs our characters make learning fun for children. A school away from school we make our videos not just to please the toddler but also to educate him/her with new concepts, skills, and ideas. We take kindergarten a step further with an in-depth understanding of a preschoolers comprehension, cognitive development, motor skills, language acquisition, executive functions, self-concept, identity development and moral values. 'Kids Channel' home to The Road Rangers, Monster Truck Dan, Little Red Car and The Haunted House Monster Truck. To get regular updates of our videos SUBSCRIBE to us.

Nursery rhymes and kid‚Äôs songs accelerate phonetic awareness improving children‚Äôs word comprehension, reading and writing skills. Rhymes for children help teach basic skills and improves their ability to comprehend and follow directions. We hope you kids are having a fun time with all your friends at Kids Channel. If you enjoyed watching this video then check out our channel for many more interesting and fun learning videos for kids by Kids Channel!

For Road Rangers videos : https://bit.ly/2EirLRW
For Monster Truck Dan Videos : https://bit.ly/2OXKd6u
For Little Red Car Videos : https://bit.ly/2ISR7nW
For Haunted House Monster Truck Videos : https://bit.ly/2NEodcb

If you enjoy our content, don‚Äôt forget to support us and subscribe :)

Visit Kids Channel's very own site: https://www.uspstudios.co/creation/channel/kids-channel/2/
Share your world with us! Send in your child's drawings, artwork, photographs, and videos while he or she is lost in our world and win a chance to be featured by us in our videos!
Send in your love by messaging us on Facebook, Instagram, and our site.

videos.title: The 1st Speed Walker to Finish the NYC Marathon
videos.description:
You guys know I love to joke around... but I ran the 2024 NYC Marathon with @maybellinenewyork & all I can say is WOW! I never imagined just how difficult this entire thing would be. What started as a funny bucket list item turned into a really amazing experience. I cried when I saw the finish line (not only because my body hurt worse than it ever has ever)... but also because I DID IT!!!! The amount of determination & mental power these athletes have is incredible! And...now.... I can actually brag that I did it. I am officially a marathon runner (speed walker). & @maybellinenewyork wow your lipstick lasted 26.2 miles!! You deserve an award! 


#NYCMarathon #MaybellinePartner

videos.title: Controversial 2000s Movies That Would Never Get Made Today
videos.description:
Have you ever watched a movie from the 2000s and thought to yourself, ‚Äòwow! Times have really changed!‚Äô The 00s was a time that may still be pretty nostalgic for many of us, but if these movies were made today, we imagine that they‚Äôd probably be canceled! For example, we really can‚Äôt see the characters portrayed by Robert Downey Jr or Ben Stiller in Tropic Thunder sitting well with modern audiences! Robert Downey Jr spoke with Joe Rogan on whether or not he thought the movie could be made nowadays, and you may be surprised by what he said! The National Lampoon‚Äôs film Van Wilder was one of those awkward early roles for a few of our favorite actors today when it came out, including Ryan Reynolds of Deadpool fame, and Kal Penn, who has since gone on to work with the Walt Disney Company on the Disney+ series The Santa Clauses. Catwoman proves why the DC Extended Universe has taken a bit of a different approach with their live action superhero movies nowadays, considering it led to Halle Berry winning a Razzie! In fact, Catwoman‚Äôs on-screen love interest wasn‚Äôt even Batman! And speaking of Batman, Ben Afleck and Jennifer Lopez may have met while working on the movie Gigli, but there is no way that Bennifer would be able to star in a movie like this again! videos.title: Stranger Things Season 4 Deleted Scenes & Alternate Ending
videos.description:
The Duffer Brothers are on their game when it comes to refining the Stranger Things scripts before getting into filming. Preproduction is almost as solid as you could imagine. So not a lot of deleted scenes really even exist! But that doesn't mean options weren't weighed. Like, who do they kill off this season? They always weigh this question heavily. The fates of Max Mayfield, Eddie Munson and even Enzo hung in the balance. Millie Bobby Brown called the Duffers a couple of Sensitive Sally's for their unwillingness to put characters on the chopping block. Their defence, though? Every death has a huge ripple effect and sometimes they just don't want to deal with other characters' grieving for a whole season! Now, that awesome Metallica scene we got of Eddie rocking out on the roof could have been a lot less smooth if the Duffers didn't have extra months to write the scripts prior to filming. They were able to change a huge chunk of his character. He also got some weird meta eulogy from Netflix where all the actors said what they'd miss about him, including Joseph Quinn. The heartwarming coded scene set in the pizza shop between Charlie Heaton's Jonathan and Noah Schnapp's Will Byers almost didn't exist. But after seeing how the love confession played out in the car they knew it was necessary. Vecna, his lair and the Demobats all went through a ton of concept art. All that and more is covered in the video!

videos.title: The Gray Man Behind the Scenes
videos.description:
The Gray Man is pushing to become the next big action movie franchise so the Russo Brothers and the rest of the stacked cast put their heart and soul into making sure it gets there. Two hundred million dollars goes a long way. Being the most money Netflix has ever invested in a film. With Ryan Gosling leading the helm in his first ever action movie, he blew the Russo's away with his dance choreography training that came in handy for the fight scenes and even made him a more impressive stage combat fighter than Captain America's Chris Evans himself! Most action movies get about four stunt scenes but this one was paired down from the novel's eleven to nine. Nine! That's actually insane. About three quarters of the movie is all action sequences. One hilarious moment was compared to Monty Python she. Director Joe Russo showed Ryan Gosling how a stunt is done by stepping in himself. Did you know this movie had almost no cut scenes? Post-production can't be understated. But the only scene that did have cuts was that hospital scene because they were experimenting with a ton of different stuff. Despite the movie being called The Gray Man, it's chocked full of colour. This was done intentionally to capture the audience's attention but they did use subtle lighting and filmmaking techniques to help the gray man fade into the background just a little bit. All that and more is covered in the video so be sure to check it out!!

Wait a minute - did you think Disney would stop giving us more behind the scenes info for Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness? Well let us be the first to show you what they were cooking up behind the scenes with a new in-depth look into all things madness!
Rolling out a film of this proportion - means you have to do things as real as possible. You need practical sets and effects - and the best CGI available. With the great Benedict Cumberbatch returning - and Elizabeth Olsen reprising her role - all you‚Äôd need is the right director. Considered to be one of the godfathers of the MCU - Sam Raimi takes on the helm - giving us a fresh take on that Marvel style. He pushed a lot of his own elements of horror - making it quite a terrifying ride for audiences. With those factors in place - Marvel could then focus on those precise details - costumes and character work. These things can really be overlooked in blockbuster films - so we‚Äôre very happy with the way it turned out in the end. With a surprising new look at the behind the scenes of Marvel‚Äôs Illuminati - you‚Äôll be curious to know how filmmakers were able to pull off such an epic team up.
America we may need your help on this one - give us the portal we want behind the scenes and make sure we don‚Äôt end up in the cartoon world. We need all of you to help her focus her powers - on the best and most interesting ways this production team pulled off this sequel!

In Stranger Things, the cast and crew do a great job of keeping us on the edge of our seats. We‚Äôve got a lot of thanks to give Sadie‚Äôs stunt double for taking some intense wipeouts and being mounted up onto a pillar after being dragged by a rope. We‚Äôll also be talking in detail about what was real in that scene, and what was not even there. videos.title: Behind The Set Of Stranger Things Season 4
videos.description:
Stranger Things has some of the coolest sets and season 4 certainly did not disappoint! From Rink-O-Mania to Skull Rock to the bottom of Love Lake, there‚Äôs plenty to explore.  Millie Bobby Brown and Noah Schnapp had a blast at the Rink-O-Mania, spending their breaks skating to Millie‚Äôs music. Love Lake required the use of a sixteen-foot-deep pool, and an old abandoned plot involving Joe Keery in a speedo! The winter Russian shots were actually done in Lithuania and froze David Harbour‚Äôs toes off. The Video Store was situated right next to a staple location from a previous season and both were originally used as the same place. Vecna‚Äôs layer is pretty freaking cool to see. The practical set is impressive but so is the CGI work! The Hawkins lab rainbow room was decked out with cushion pads to break the fall of the actors. There have been some brilliant homages to 80‚Äôs movies including E.T. We wish Surfer Boy Pizza was real. Good news! For a limited time, it is! The trailer park and the cemetery are being used to their full potential this season. Hawkins High School will look familiar to you, and we mean as more than just the high school you‚Äôve already seen. It looks oddly familiar but we just can‚Äôt put our finger on it. The Creel House in its untouched form is far more beautiful than what they did with it for the show. It‚Äôs been a pretty intense season so far and we still have part 2 to look forward to!

videos.title: Stranger Things S4 Cast Getting Ready Behind The Scenes
videos.description:
Stranger Things Season 4 is filled with prosthetics and fabulous 80‚Äôs makeup and costumes. So we thought it would be fun to take a peek at the process of getting into costume. Vecna was, of course, the most challenging prosthetic of not just the season but the entire show given it‚Äôs the first time they‚Äôve really worked with prosthetics of this calibre, relying on CGI more in the past. Millie Bobby Brown takes an hour to get into costume thanks to her wig. Finn Wolfhard is tied for fastest to get into costume with the stand-out actor of the season, Sadie Sink. You couldn‚Äôt see anything but white through the white contacts so the wardrobe department thought it would be fun for the actors to try a little something to keep their nerves in check. Robert Englund knows everything about makeup and prosthetics after all his years playing Freddy Kreuger and other roles. He went straight from the makeup chair to another chair where he was bound to it. The poor guy couldn‚Äôt see, speak or use his hands. Did you know the origin story behind Gaten Matarazzo‚Äôs character, Dustin‚Äôs hats? David Harbour probably had the longest prep time. His prep started way before filming even began when he had to shed some weight to become malnourished Hopper. Dacre Montgomery had a fun time at the end of the day making a mess of his prosthetics. Joe Keery rolls onto set looking just a wee bit sleepy. Grace Van Dien willingly let her hair be cut for her role as Chrissy. Cara Buono and Joseph Quinn were rocking some awesome wigs. Yes, the looks this season were a pain to craft but all that work really pays off,

videos.title: Stranger Things Season 4 Bloopers And Cute Cast Moments
videos.description:
Bloopers. Silly moments. Ridiculous antics. Weird observations. Dance parties. That‚Äôs what the cast of Stranger Things season 4 was all about. Millie Bobby Brown and Noah Schnapp got into the Fruit by the Foot challenge and the winner won by a long shot. See what we did there? Millie also crashed into Noah in a super cute-yet quirky incident that left them in an awkward pile on the floor. Last we checked this was rollerskating, not Twister! You may recall Finn being hit in the head with a suction-cuppy arrow. Well, it was a strange affair for him. Sadie Sink‚Äôs peaceful morning was so rudely interrupted by her costars destroying a chicken quesadilla. Noah‚Äôs favourite moment on set was actually his least favourite. One stunt person left them all hanging right at the end of the shot and they had to redo possible one of the trickiest shots in the whole season. ‚ÄòHow‚Äôs that funny?‚Äô you ask. Well, it‚Äôs all about what came next. Whether getting dressed up for jail or dressed down for waffles, Millie‚Äôs always considering her outfit. Sports were a big part of season 4. From learning to drive a golf ball to bowling without shoes on, going hard on the badminton course, or even just playing a good old-fashioned game of paper towel ball, we‚Äôve come to understand sportsball is suuuuuper dangerous. We‚Äôre also going to take a bit of a rewind to our favourite moments from season 3. Ketchup and Mustard: The Musical was a big highlight. Hard to believe we only get one more season of antics after this.

videos.title: Divergent Behind The Scenes
videos.description:
Have you ever wondered what goes into making a complex film like Divergent? Well, wonder no more-- we‚Äôve done all the research for you! We will be learning about the intense, Dauntless bootcamp the entire cast had to complete, the iconic seven-story jump ‚Äì just how many takes did she do? We'll also be learning about the stunning visual effects that were meticulously crafted to maintain believabiltiy.
Part of what made Divergent such a fun film to shoot, was the natural chemistry between the cast. They had such much of it, in fact, that Theo James pulls a prank on Shailene Woodley during the big ferris wheel scene. How did they find Theo to play Four, anyway?
Did you know the author, Veronica Roth, was very involved  in making the film? So involved, she might‚Äôve actually been in front of the camera a few times. If you missed her, don't worry, we‚Äôll fill you in.
The Divergent world is full of incredible fight scenes, special effects, and elaborate set pieces you wouldn‚Äôt believe are actually set pieces‚Äì yes we‚Äôre talking about the pit! We‚Äôre also going to go into how much the city of Chicago shaped the visuals and special effects as well as the inevitable battle scars received by Zoe Kravitz and Shailene Woodley! And did we mention the incredible zipline that travels through all of downtown Chicago? After this video, you'll be an expert on how an action-packed film like Divergent is brought to life.

videos.title: 15 Stranger Things Scenes The Actors Were Terrified To Film
videos.description:
Stranger Things season Four is the stuff that nightmares are made of! We were terrified just watching, we can‚Äôt imagine the struggle the actors faced while filming these chilling moments. With the penultimate season being described as the darkest one yet - you‚Äôll wanna make sure you have the lights on while you watch!
Sadie Sink has been stealing the show as Max - especially because she so bravely faced some of the most terrifying situations we‚Äôve ever seen on the show! Her escape from Vecna was far from easy, but our girl kept running up that hill. No one likes a Demogorgon, even if you‚Äôve dealt with one before, so seeing this freaky creature again brought back some trauma. Remember - these kids were young when they started and that creature was HORRIFYING. 
We get stunts galore in this season - including an intense underwater one that Joe Keery literally dove into headfirst. Filming in a tank filled with gallons of water was no walk in the park. He wasn‚Äôt the only one to struggle with underwater scenes - which scary moment in an earlier season had the production shaken up? Speaking of brutal conditions - David Harbour faces an excruciatingly tough scene to film that saw his feet freezing in a not-so-friendly environment. Millie Bobby Brown‚Äôs Eleven has it tough on screen, and this trooper had it equally rough behind the scenes filming certain stunts that had her literally spinning out of control!
The series just gets scarier as the actors grow up - we can‚Äôt imagine what kind of horrors we‚Äôll see when the series wraps with its fifth season!

videos.title: Sadie Sink Growing Up On The Stranger Things Set
videos.description:
Sadie Sink has stolen the show in Stranger Things season 4. We‚Äôre so glad they finally leaned into her arc and gave her a chance to shine. So we thought this would be a good time to reflect on her time in the Stranger Things cast. It‚Äôs hard to believe now that she hasn‚Äôt been here since the beginning, only showing up in season 2 because she fits right in with the gang! Did you know her first kiss happened on set? Talk about awkward‚Ä¶ Or was it? She and Millie Bobby Brown, in a rather spooky moment of filming, made up a dance to reflect their ketchup and mustard-coloured raincoats. Where can we buy one of those? She was getting friendly with some dogs on set. She is an animal lover through and through! She loved being able to work with the real Vecna and not some guy in a green suit. Thank you Jamie Campbell Bower for sitting in the makeup chair for six hours! While Sadie got to walk in and walk right on set. Getting ready for her took no time at all. She‚Äôs an odd duck. Weird things fascinate her like ants, quesadillas, and her co-stars Gaten Matarazzo and Caleb McLaughlin. Did you know she was terrified of Stranger Things when she first watched the show? We assume she watched it for research purposes because she hates scary movies and shows. It must‚Äôve been a relief come season 3 when the costumes were so colourful and the sun was shining. Just watch her grow up on the set of Stranger Things before your very eyes. She‚Äôs funny. She‚Äôs a fashion icon. She‚Äôs an activist. We love her.

videos.title: 12 Props the Stranger Things Actors Stole from Set
videos.description:
Everyone loves to keep some mementos from sets they‚Äôve worked on, but the ways they get them sometimes aren‚Äôt so honorable. The Stranger Things actors had all kinds of cool stuff to swipe from the set - but what did they take - and who was willing to risk it?! 
Some actors have been VERY tightlipped about their stealing habits, only letting us know something was swiped, but never specifying anything, just keeping the mystery alive. Noah Schnapp stole a pretty useful prop - and he made them even better by having the cast autograph them. Millie Bobby Brown stole a prop that could also come in useful - but in a very different way. If we‚Äôre being honest, it‚Äôs a pretty creepy one! 
The young actors are paid pretty well, but that didn‚Äôt stop them from stealing some weird necessities from the wardrobe department. Millie Bobby Brown took all that a step further when she had a little shopping spree at the Starcourt Mall - on the dime of the production. Sadie Sink swiper her own bit of clothing as well - although she does protest that it was a total accident.
Millie Bobby Brown has also swiped mementos from the sets of Enola Holmes and a tv show she did in her early days. Some items make total sense while others surprise us, but she had a pretty valid reason for each of them.
No matter how big or small, cheap or expensive, nothing was going to stop these actors from getting to keep what they wanted from the set- even if they did have to do it pretty sneakily at times!

videos.title: Stranger Things Cast On The Season 4 Set
videos.description:
Stranger Things Season 4 was a party behind the scenes. Seriously, it looks like there wasn‚Äôt a dull moment on this set which is such a jarring realization given the show itself is so dark! There are plenty of pranks, games and terrifying prosthetics to keep the young cast entertained. Starting off with a dark one did you hear how Vecna made Millie Bobby Brown cry? That‚Äôs not the only time tears happened either, the extreme bullying scene was so intense it not only overwhelmed her but her co-star Noah Schnapp. And one other thing for Millie is she was sick and tired of shaving off all of her hair. Is fame even worth it if you have no hair? Sadie Sink got to try her hand at stunt work with that levitating scene. One actor, poor Christopher Strand, was completely restricted from talking, seeing and even moving his arms thanks to his prosthetics. They had to come up with a system for communicating. Then you‚Äôve got Millie and Noah roller-skating, Caleb McLaughlin scored a basket while goofing around on set waiting to film the next scene, and Charlie Heaton and Eduardo Franco were drinking and golfing. Seriously this does not sound like work to us. It sounds like a big excuse to party. Well, two can play at that game. We‚Äôre going to write a script about people who hang out at the beach all day. And speaking of the beach, you‚Äôll never guess how barefoot scenes are filmed. It‚Äôs so simple it‚Äôs obvious but we never even questioned it!
